strapiPost.title: Bentonville Startup Receives $25m In Investments
strapiPost.content:
Soda Health, a healthcare technology company based in Bentonville, received $25m from investor groups to help them build solutions that will eliminate health inequities and create a healthier America. 

  • Do I drink it? Nope. It's not a beverage company. Soda Health derives its name from the concept of Social Determinants of Health (SDOH) or non-medical factors that influence an individualâ€™s overall health, such as access to transportation, healthy foods, or over-the-counter medications.
  • Building bridges: Billions of dollars worth of the supplemental benefits available to Americans through their health insurance go unused every year because accessing those benefits is often such a hassle. Soda Health is developing the necessary infrastructure to bridge the gap between Americans and these available resources, providing consumers with a single debit card that aims to streamline the payment process for their available benefits.

Read more on the story HERE.
